## Tuple.InsertInner type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type InsertInner<T extends Tuple, I extends number, V, S extends Tuple> = I extends Size<T> ? Append<T, V> : T extends readonly [infer H, ...infer R] ? I extends Size<S> ? [V, H, ...R] : [H, ...InsertInner<R, I, V, Append<S, H>>] : T;
```
